divs: Sighting DetailsSaw a glowing pulsating red orange colored object in the night sky on Nov. 3rd 2011 at aprox. 7pm, moving along at about 60 degrees, stopped, hoverd, backed up, changed directions, disapeard and reapeard, hoverd, then disapeard for good.
